Hi David, I can't reproduce the problem using the attachments from bug 99267 
using the latest I-build.

The issue is that there is no schema element (the xml declaration is 
irrelevant).   The schema editor should check if there is one, and if there 
isn't, add one before creating the XSD model.   Currently, the check is to see 
if the file is blank and zero-length only.  The check should be more stringent, 
and include a test for a schema element.

This should be a safe change.
*** Bug 99267 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
The fix is checked in and will be in tonight's I-build

completely correct XML Schema document otherwise.
